HEADING: Banned Users
INTRO_PARAGRAPH_1: Below is a list of your users, or emails, that have been banned from commenting or voting on your domains. If a user is "shadow banned" their comments and votes will still appear to post for them, but they won't be saved.
INTRO_PARAGRAPH_2: You can ban users via the "ban" option on the Moderate Comments page, or by clicking the plus icon at the bottom of this page if you have a specific email to ban.
INTRO_PARAGRAPH_3: When banned users try to comment it will show up in the audit log with the description "Banned user blocked from commenting."
IP_BAN_WARNING: FastComments does not store raw IP addresses for IP based banning. Be careful when using IP based bans as IP addresses can be reassigned.
SHOWING_BANNED_USERS: Showing <%= Number((page - 1) * count).toLocaleString() %> - <%= Number(((page - 1) * count) + bannedUsers.length).toLocaleString() %> of <%= totalCount %> Banned Users
NO_BANNED_USERS_MESSAGE: You don't have any banned users! Congrats on having a great community.
